_header: My folk what have I do thee
Note:
Cf. Robbins (1957)
XRobbins, Rossell Hope. “Friar Herebert and the Carol.” Anglia 75 (1957): 194-8, 196-7.
_description: ‘Popule meus quid feci tibi’, by William Herebert — thirteen stanzas of varying length, perhaps a proto-carol

BLAdd46919.First Lines: My volk what habbe y do þeOþer in what þyng toened þeSyn nouþe ad onswere þou me…
BLAdd46919.Last Lines: …Ich muchel worshype doede to þeAnd þou me hongest on rode troe
BLAdd46919.Note: In last line “hongest” is scribal correction for “henge.”
BLAdd46919.Attributed Author: Herebert (in upper margin to right of title, f. 206)
BLAdd46919.Attributed Title: Popule meus quid feci tibi & cetera (above poem, f. 206)
